1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using an analytical balance. 2. In a clean glass container, combine Cs, Mg, and Zn first, and stir until uniformly mixed. 3. Gradually add Mn, stirring continuously. 4. Finally, add Te and mix thoroughly until a homogenous blend is achieved.
